00019 /*
00020  * lustre/utils/liblustreapi_param.c
00021  *
00022  * This code handles user interaction with the configuration interface
00023  * to the Lustre file system to fine tune it.
00024  */
00025 #include <errno.h>
00026 #include <stdint.h>
00027 
00028 #include <libcfs/util/param.h>
00029 #include <lustre/lustre_user.h>
00030 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00031 #include "lustreapi_internal.h"
00032 
00062 int
00063 get_lustre_param_path(const char *obd_type, const char *filter,
00064                       enum param_filter type, const char *param_name,
00065                       glob_t *param)
00066 {
00067         char pattern[PATH_MAX];
00068         int rc = 0;
00069 
00070         if (filter == NULL || obd_type == NULL)
00071                 return -EINVAL;
00072 
00073         switch (type) {
00074         case FILTER_BY_PATH:
00075                 rc = llapi_search_fsname(filter, pattern);
00076                 if (rc) {
00077                         llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, rc,
00078                                     "'%s' is not on a Lustre filesystem",
00079                                     filter);
00080                         return rc;
00081                 }
00082                 if (strlen(pattern) + 3 > sizeof(pattern))
00083                         return -E2BIG;
00084                 strncat(pattern, "-*", sizeof(pattern));
00085                 break;
00086         case FILTER_BY_FS_NAME:
00087                 rc = snprintf(pattern, sizeof(pattern) - 1, "%s-*", filter);
00088                 if (rc < 0)
00089                         return rc;
00090                 else if (rc >= sizeof(pattern))
00091                         return -EINVAL;
00092                 rc = 0;
00093                 break;
00094         default:
00095                 if (strlen(filter) + 1 > sizeof(pattern))
00096                         return -E2BIG;
00097                 strncpy(pattern, filter, sizeof(pattern));
00098                 break;
00099         }
00100 
00101         if (param_name != NULL) {
00102                 if (cfs_get_param_paths(param, "%s/%s/%s",
00103                                        obd_type, pattern, param_name) != 0)
00104                         rc = -errno;
00105         } else {
00106                 if (cfs_get_param_paths(param, "%s/%s",
00107                                        obd_type, pattern) != 0)
00108                         rc = -errno;
00109         }
00110 
00111         return rc;
00112 }
00113 
00145 int
00146 get_lustre_param_value(const char *obd_type, const char *filter,
00147                        enum param_filter type, const char *param_name,
00148                        char *value, size_t val_len)
00149 {
00150         glob_t param;
00151         FILE *fp;
00152         int rc;
00153 
00154         rc = get_lustre_param_path(obd_type, filter, type, param_name, &param);
00155         if (rc != 0)
00156                 return -ENOENT;
00157 
00158         fp = fopen(param.gl_pathv[0], "r");
00159         if (fp == NULL) {
00160                 rc = -errno;
00161                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, rc, "error: opening '%s'",
00162                             param.gl_pathv[0]);
00163                 goto err;
00164         }
00165 
00166         if (fgets(value, val_len, fp) == NULL) {
00167                 if (!feof(fp))
00168                         rc = -ferror(fp);
00169         }
00170         fclose(fp);
00171 err:
00172         cfs_free_param_data(&param);
00173 
00174         return rc;
00175 }
